Description: BRING YOUR PETS...............SECOND FLOOR WITH TWO PLUS BEDROOMS NO LEAD PAINT....VAULTED CEILINGS HARDWOOD FLOORS AND CENTRAL AIR GOURMET KITCHEN..KITCHEN IS EAT IN NEW WINDOWS..............................HEATED BY GAS PARKING FOR TWO CARS IN DRIVEWAY TANDUM CALL OR TEXT AVAILABLE...AUGUST 15 OR SEPTEMBER FIRST BEAUTIFUL UNIT WALK TO JOGGING PATH ON CHARLES RIVER AND BUS TO WATERTOWN SQUARE OWNER WANTS GREAT CREDIT ONE MONTHS BROKER FEE PAID BY NEW TENANT IF APPROVED CALL OR TEXT
